snippet: Rick Santorum said Mitt Romney's plan is not "particularly bold" and accused the former Massachusetts governor of buying into Democratic rhetoric that divides Americans.
abstract: Rick Santorum said Mitt Romney's plan is not "particularly bold" and accused the former Massachusetts governor of buying into Democratic rhetoric that divides Americans.
lead_paragraph: And there it is -- Rick Santorum's full-throated argument against Mitt Romney's bid for the presidency.

headline.main: Late in the Debate, Santorum Criticizes Romney on Economy
